content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: TFORRES
      operator: is_not_unique_set
      value:
        - USUBJID
        - TFSPEC
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.200
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when there is more than one record present for any particular
  tumor test result for a subject and specimen.
Outcome:
  Message: The Tumor Findings test result is not unique for this subject and specimen.
  Output Variables:
    - USUBJID
    - TFTESTCD
    - TFORRES
    - TFSPEC
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '200'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: One record per tumor per specimen per subject
                Document: SENDIG v3.1
                Section: 6.3.14
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TF

json.Description: Raise an error when there is more than one record present for any particular tumor test result for a subject and specimen.

Outcome.Message: The Tumor Findings test result is not unique for this subject and specimen.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: One record per tumor per specimen per subject
